original: DAHLIN, Sven Peder Anton, Bankdirektör, Karlstad, f 14/4 86 av folksk.lär Sven D o Hanna Ohlsson, gm Elna Wennerstrand. Studex 05, kansliex 07. Anst å kont i Sthlm 05, e.o. bokh AB Sthlms hdlsbk 06, Sk hdlsbkn 07—18, led o ass i bkinsp 07—19, byråinsp i bk- o fondinsp 20, led o 1. byråinsp där 21, sparbksinsp o ch f sparbksinsp 29—34, vkst dir f Wermlands ensk bk AB sed. 34, bitr i utredn ang vissa sparbks inställda betaln 29. Ordf i Karlst stdsflm, landst.m i Värml län. Styr.led Sv Bankfrn, AB Karlst mek werkst, Munksjö AB, Lagamilis AB, Åmotfors Pappersbruks AB, Bäckhammars AB, AB Rottneros Bruk mfl. RNO, KVO2kl.
translated: DAHLIN, Sven Peder Anton, Bank Director, Karlstad, b. 14/4 1886, son of elementary school teacher Sven D and Hanna Ohlsson, married to Elna Wennerstrand. Completed secondary school in 1905, completed clerkship in 1907. Employed at a bank in Stockholm from 1905, temporary accountant at AB Stockholm's commercial court in 1906, commercial court clerk from 1907-1918, member and assistant at the bank inspection from 1907-1919, bureau inspector at the banking and stock inspection from 1920, member and first bureau inspector there from 1921, savings bank inspector and chief savings bank inspector from 1929-1934, deputy director of Wermlands Enskilda Bank AB since 1934, assistant in investigations regarding certain savings bank suspended payments in 1929. Chairman of the Karlstad City Film Board, county commissioner of Värmland county. Board member of Swedish Bankfrn, AB Karlstad Mechanical Workshop, Munksjö AB, Lagamilis AB, Åmotfors Pulp Mill AB, Bäckhammars AB, AB Rottneros Bruk, among others. Awarded Royal Order of the North Star, 2nd class, and the Order of Vasa, 2nd class.

occupation.title: Bank Director
